alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:50PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 530 PM MST... At 449 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near and over Globe, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 235 and 266. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 259. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 165 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
